ceterms:AccreditAction.definition: An action by an independent, neutral, and authoritative agent that certifies a resource as meeting a prescribed set of standards.

ceterms:AdvancedStandingAction.definition: An claim by an agent asserting that the object credential of the action provides advanced standing for a credential under the asserting agent's authority.

ceterms:Agent.definition: A resource that acts or has the power to act.

ceterms:ApprenticeshipCertificate.definition: A credential earned through work-based learning and postsecondary earn-and-learn models that meet national standards and are applicable to industry trades and professions.

ceterms:ApproveAction.definition: An action by an independent, neutral, and authoritative agent that pronounces a favorable judgment of a resource.

ceterms:Assessment.definition: Direct, indirect, formative and summative evaluation or estimation of the nature, ability, or quality of a resource, performance, or outcome of an action.

ceterms:AssessmentProfile.definition: A resource that describes the key characteristics of an assessment for a credential.

ceterms:AssociateDegree.definition: An award level that normally requires at least 2 but less than 4 years of full-time equivalent college-level work.

ceterms:BachelorDegree.definition: An award level that normally requires at least 4 but not more than 5 years of full-time equivalent college-level work.

ceterms:Badge.definition: A recognition designed to be displayed as a marker of accomplishment, activity, achievement, skill, interest, association, or identity.

ceterms:CareerPathway.definition: An integrated collection of credentials, programs, experiences, and services intended to develop technical, academic, and employability skills in a cluster of occupations that share common skills, knowledge, and interests.

ceterms:Certificate.definition: A credential that designates requisite mastery of the knowledge and skills of an occupation, profession, or academic program.

ceterms:Certification.definition: A time-limited, renewable non-degree credential awarded by an authoritative body to an individual or organization for demonstrating the designated knowledge, skills, and abilities to perform a specific job.

ceterms:Competency.definition: An assertion of measurable or observable knowledge, skills, and abilities necessary to successful performance of a person in a given context.

ceterms:CompetencyFramework.definition: An entity comprised of a logically related set of competencies.

ceterms:ConditionProfile.definition: A resource describing a condition between a credential and other resources to which the credential is subject during its lifecycle including the requirements to attain the credential.

ceterms:ContactPoint.definition: A means of contacting a resource or its representative(s).

ceterms:CostProfile.definition: The type and nature of direct costs one would incur if one were to pursue attaining a credential.

ceterms:Course.definition: A description of an educational course which may be offered as distinct instances at different times and places, or through different media or modes of study. An educational course is a sequence of one or more educational events and/or creative works which aims to build knowledge, competence or ability of learners.

ceterms:Credential.definition: A qualification, achievement, personal or organizational quality, or aspect of anidentitytypically used to indicate suitability.

ceterms:CredentialAlignmentObject.definition: An alignment to a credentialing framework.

ceterms:CredentialAssertion.definition: The class of  representations of an awarded credential, used to share information about a credential belonging to one holder.

ceterms:CredentialFramework.definition: The class of all structured sets of conceptual resources intentionally designed for use as value vocabulary terms for description and classification in the credentialing context.

ceterms:CredentialingAction.definition: An action taken by an agent affecting the status of an object resource.

ceterms:CredentialOrganization.definition: An organization that plays one or more key roles in the lifecycle of a credential.

ceterms:CredentialPerson.definition: An person who plays one or more key roles in the lifecycle of a credential.

ceterms:Degree.definition: An academic credential conferred upon completion of a program or course of study, typically over multiple years at postsecondary education institutions.

ceterms:DigitalBadge.definition: A badge offered in digital form.

ceterms:Diploma.definition: A credential awarded by educational institutions for successfully completion of a course of study or its equivalent.

ceterms:DoctoralDegree.definition: The highest award level to be earned for postsecondary study.

ceterms:DurationProfile.definition: A resource describing the temporal aspects of a resource.

ceterms:EarningsProfile.definition: A resource that describes earning and related statistical information for a given credential.

ceterms:EmploymentOutcomeProfile.definition: The employment outcomes and related statistical information for a given credential.

ceterms:FinancialAlignmentObject.definition: An alignment to a financial framework.

ceterms:GeneralEducationDevelopment.definition: A credential awarded by examination that demonstrates that an individual has acquired secondary school-level academic skills.

ceterms:GeoCoordinates.definition: The geographic coordinates of a place or event.

ceterms:HoldersProfile.definition: The count and related statistical information of holders of a given credential.

ceterms:IndustryClassification.definition: The class of enumerations identifying industries.

ceterms:InstructionalProgramClassificati.definition: The class of enumerations identifying instructional programs.

ceterms:JourneymanCertificate.definition: A credential awarded to skilled workers on successful completion of an apprenticeship in industry trades and professions.

ceterms:JurisdictionProfile.definition: Geo-political information about applicable geographic areas and their exceptions.

ceterms:LearningOpportunity.definition: Structured and unstructured learning and development opportunities based in direct experience, formal and informal study, observation, and involvement in discourse and practice.

ceterms:LearningOpportunityProfile.definition: A resource describing a learning opportunity.

ceterms:LearningResource.definition: An entity that is used as part of an Educational Activity (e.g. a textbook) or that describes (e.g. a lesson plan) or records the Educational Activity (e.g. an audio- or video-recording of a lesson).

ceterms:License.definition: A credential awarded by a government agency that constitutes legal authority to do a specific job and/or utilize a specific item, system or infrastructure and are typically earned through some combination of degree or certificate attainment, certifications, assessments, work experience, and/or fees, and are time-limited and must be renewed periodically.

ceterms:MasterCertificate.definition: A credential awarded upon demonstration through apprenticeship of the highest level of skills and performance in industry trades and professions.

ceterms:MasterDegree.definition: An award level that requires the successful completion of a program of study of at least the full-time equivalent of 1 but not more than 2 academic years of work beyond the bachelor's degree.

ceterms:MicroCredential.definition: A credential that attests to achievement of a specific knowledge, skill, or competency.

ceterms:OccupationClassification.definition: The class of enumerations identifying occupations.

ceterms:OfferAction.definition: An action by an authoritative agent offering access to a resource.

ceterms:OpenBadge.definition: An Open Badge is a visual symbol containing verifiable claims in accordance with the Open Badges specification and delivered digitally.

ceterms:ProcessProfile.definition: The type, nature, and related information about a process related to a credential.

ceterms:ProfessionalDoctorate.definition: A doctoral degree conferred upon completion of a program providing the knowledge and skills for the recognition, credential, or license required for professional practice.

ceterms:QACredentialOrganization.definition: A quality assurance organization that plays one or more key roles in the lifecycle of a resource.

ceterms:QualityAssuranceCredential.definition: A credential assuring that an organization, program, or awarded credential meets prescribed requirements and may include development and administration of qualifying examinations.

ceterms:RecognizeAction.definition: An action by an independent, neutral, and authoritative agent acknowledging the validity of a resource.

ceterms:RegulateAction.definition: An action by an independent, neutral, and authoritative agent enforcing the legal requirements of a resource.

ceterms:RenewAction.definition: An action by an authoritative agent renewing an existing credential assertion.

ceterms:ResearchDoctorate.definition: A doctoral degree conferred for advanced work beyond the master level, including the preparation and defense of a thesis or dissertation based on original research, or the planning and execution of an original project demonstrating substantial artistic or scholarly achievement.

ceterms:RevocationProfile.definition: The conditions and methods by which a credential can be removed from a holder.

ceterms:RevokeAction.definition: An action by an authoritative agent removing a credential assertion from the credential holder based on violations.

ceterms:RightsAction.definition: An action asserting rights by an authoritative agent to possess, defend, transfer, license, and grant conditional access to a resource.

ceterms:SecondarySchoolDiploma.definition: A diploma awarded by secondary education institutions for successful completion of a secondary school program typically lasting four years.

ceterms:TaskProfile.definition: A profile describing the required or recommended tasks to be performed by a holder of, or applicant for, a credential assertion.

ceterms:VerificationServiceProfile.definition: A resource describing the means by which someone can verify whether a credential has been attained.

ceterms:accreditedBy.definition: An agent that accredits the described resource.

ceterms:accreditedIn.definition: The resource being described is accredited in the jurisdiction being referenced.

ceterms:accredits.definition: The agent being described gives a formal status to the resource being referenced based on the resource's conformance to prescribed standards or criteria.

ceterms:actingAgent.definition: The direct performer or driver (animate or inanimate) of an action.

ceterms:actionStatusType.definition: Indicates the current disposition of the action.

ceterms:addressCountry.definition: The country. For example, USA. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

ceterms:addressLocality.definition: The locality. For example, Mountain View.

ceterms:administrationProcess.definition: A profile of the process by which the resource being described, or aspects of it, are administered.

ceterms:advancedStandingFrom.definition: The resource being described has time or cost reduced by the resource being referenced.

ceterms:affiliatedAgent.definition: An agent that plays some role in assigning, performing, assisting with, facilitating, approving of, or otherwise being involved in or with the resource being described.

ceterms:affiliation.definition: An organization that this person is affiliated with. For example, a school/university, a club, or a team.

ceterms:agent.definition: The direct performer or driver of the action (animate or inanimate).

ceterms:agentPurpose.definition: A resource that describes the agent's primary purpose.

ceterms:agentPurposeDescription.definition: A description of the primary purpose of the agent being referenced.

ceterms:agentSectorType.definition: The types of sociological, economic, or political subdivision of society served by an agent.

ceterms:agentType.definition: The type of the described agent.

ceterms:alignmentDate.definition: The date  the alignment was made.

ceterms:alignmentType.definition: A category of alignment between the learning resource and the framework node.

ceterms:alternativeCondition.definition: A set of conditions in the context of requirements where more than one alternative set or path have been defined and from which any one path fulfills the parent conditions.

ceterms:alternativeIdentifier.definition: An alternative, publicly available and globally unique agent identifier issued by an authoritative entity.

ceterms:approvedBy.definition: Pronouncement of a favorable judgment by the agent being referenced.

ceterms:approvedIn.definition: The resource being described is approved in the jurisdiction being referenced.

ceterms:approves.definition: The agent being described officially accepts or authorizes the resource being referenced.

ceterms:assertedBy.definition: The agent providing the information contained in the entity being described.

ceterms:assessmentExample.definition: A resource that provides an example assessment or assessment item.

ceterms:assessmentExampleDescription.definition: Text of an example assessment item.

ceterms:assessmentMethodType.definition: The method used to conduct the assessment being referenced

ceterms:assessmentOutput.definition: A more precise refinement of the assessment type.

ceterms:assessmentProfiled.definition: The resource being referenced is an assessment profile of the resource being described.

ceterms:assessmentUseType.definition: The intended use of the assessment being referenced.

ceterms:audienceLevelType.definition: A point in a progression through an educational or training context, for which the described resource is intended.

ceterms:availabilityListing.definition: A resource that lists online and/or physical locations for the described resource.

ceterms:availableAt.definition: The location where the described resource is available.

ceterms:availableOnlineAt.definition: The online location where the described resource is available.

ceterms:broadAlignment.definition: The resource being referenced covers all of the relevant concepts in the resource being described as well as relevant concepts not found in the resource being described.

ceterms:codedNotation.definition: A short set of alpha-numeric symbols that uniquely identifies a resource and supports its discovery.

ceterms:condition.definition: A list of individual conditions or aspects of experience.

ceterms:conditionProfiled.definition: The resource being described is a profile of the conditions being referenced.

ceterms:contactOption.definition: An option available on this contact point.

ceterms:contactPoint.definition: A contact point for a person or organization.

ceterms:contactType.definition: Specification of the type of contact.

ceterms:copyrightHolder.definition: The party holding the legal copyright to the CreativeWork.

ceterms:costDetails.definition: A resource containing human-readable, in-depth information about the cost of the credential.

ceterms:credentialAlignment.definition: An alignment to an established framework serving the credentialing environment.

ceterms:credentialId.definition: A globally unique identifier by which the creator/owner/provider of a credential recognizes the credential in transactions with the external environment (e.g., in verifiable claims involving the credential).

ceterms:credentialingAction.definition: Indicates a potential credentialing action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.

ceterms:credentialProfiled.definition: The resource being described is a profile of the credential being referenced.

ceterms:credentialType.definition: The resource being referenced is a specific sub-class of the ceterms:Credential class.

ceterms:creditHourType.definition: Units of time corresponding to types of credits.

ceterms:creditHourValue.definition: The number of credit hours awarded for completing or attaining the resource being described.

ceterms:creditUnitType.definition: The type of credit associated with degree and non-degree learning opportunities.

ceterms:creditUnitTypeDescription.definition: A more refined, detailed description of credit unit type.

ceterms:creditUnitValue.definition: The number of either credit units awarded for college credit or continuing education units for completing or attaining the resource being described.

ceterms:ctid.definition: A globally unique Credential Transparency Identifier (CTID) issued by the Credential Registry Service (CRS) by which the creator/owner/provider of a credential recognizes the credential in transactions with the external environment (e.g., in verifiable claims involving the credential).

ceterms:currency.definition: The currency in which the monetary amount is expressed (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format).

ceterms:dateEffective.definition: The effective date of the described resource content.

ceterms:degreeConcentration.definition: A structured plan of study within a degree major.

ceterms:degreeMajor.definition: The primary field of study of a degree-seeking student.

ceterms:degreeMinor.definition: An optional, secondary field of study of a degree-seeking student.

ceterms:deliveryType.definition: The means by which the resource being described is delivered to people or interacted with by people.

ceterms:deliveryTypeDescription.definition: A more detailed, refined description of delivery type.

ceterms:demographicInformation.definition: Statistical data or summaries of statistical data relating to the population of credential holders.

ceterms:department.definition: The organization being referenced is a department of the organization being described.

ceterms:description.definition: A short description of the resource being described.

ceterms:developmentProcess.definition: A profile of the process by which the resource being described, or aspects of it, were created.

ceterms:directCostType.definition: One or more types of direct costs associated with attaining the credential.

ceterms:duns.definition: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

ceterms:earnings.definition: The resource being referenced is a profile of credential holder earnings data

ceterms:email.definition: Email address of the agent being described.

ceterms:employee.definition: The referenced person is an employee of the organization being described.

ceterms:employmentOutcome.definition: A profile of jobs obtained with this credential by occupation and industry for a given period and area.

ceterms:entryCondition.definition: The prerequisites for entry into the resource being described.

ceterms:estimatedCost.definition: The estimated cost of the described resource.

ceterms:estimatedDuration.definition: The estimated time it will take to complete the described activity.

ceterms:exactAlignment.definition: The relevant concepts in the resources being compared are coextensive.

ceterms:exactDuration.definition: The exact amount of time it will take to complete the described activity.

ceterms:experience.definition: The amount and nature of required work, experiential learning, or other relevant experience.

ceterms:externalInputType.definition: The types of external stakeholders that provide input to the processes related to the resource being described.

ceterms:externalResearch.definition: A resource that provides information about research that supports one or more aspects of the resource being described.

ceterms:familyName.definition: Family name. In the U.S., the last name of an Person.

ceterms:fein.definition: A Federal Employer Identification Number (FEIN) for identifying organizations, persons, states, government agencies, corporations, and companies.

ceterms:foundingDate.definition: The date that this organization was founded.

ceterms:framework.definition: The framework to which the resource being described is aligned.

ceterms:frameworkName.definition: The name of the framework to which the resource being described is aligned.

ceterms:givenName.definition: The first name of a Person.

ceterms:globalJurisdiction.definition: Indicates that the jurisdiction is global and applies to all places and nations.

ceterms:hasGroupEvaluation.definition: Participants in the assessment activity being referenced are scored as a group.

ceterms:hasGroupParticipation.definition: Completing the assessment activity being referenced requires two or more participants.

ceterms:hasPart.definition: Indicates a resource that is (in some sense) a part of the resource being described.

ceterms:hasVerificationService.definition: A profile of available systems provided by the described agent to verify credential holders.

ceterms:holderMustAuthorize.definition: Whether or not the holder of a credential must authorize the organization to provide the verification service.

ceterms:holders.definition: A profile of the number and characteristics of credentialed individuals and their geographic locations.

ceterms:honorificSuffix.definition: An honorific suffix preceding a Person's name such as M.D. /PhD/MSCSW.

ceterms:identifierType.definition: Formal name or acronym of the identifier type.

ceterms:identifierValueCode.definition: An alphanumeric string identifier of a resource.

ceterms:image.definition: The image or icon that represents the resource.

ceterms:industryType.definition: The class identifier for the industry context from an established framework.

ceterms:instructionalProgramType.definition: The class identifier for instructional program context.

ceterms:instrument.definition: The object that helped the agent perform the action. e.g. John wrote a book with a pen.

ceterms:ipedsID.definition: The unique six (6) digit identifier assigned to all institutions that have submitted data to the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS).

ceterms:isAdvancedStandingFor.definition: The resource being described reduces time or cost for the resource being referenced.

ceterms:isPartOf.definition: Indicates a resource that the resource being described is (in some sense) part of.

ceterms:isPreparationFor.definition: The resource being described provides preparation for the resource being referenced.

ceterms:isProctored.definition: An administrative process that ensures the assessment is being delivered to the right person(s) under the right conditions (e.g., instructions, time, materials, equipment) and without access to unauthorized assistance (e.g., other people, references).

ceterms:isRecommendedFor.definition: The resources being described is recommended for the resource being referenced.

ceterms:isRequiredFor.definition: The resource being described is required for the resource being referenced.

ceterms:isSimilarTo.definition: A reference to another, functionally similar resource.

ceterms:jobsObtained.definition: The number of jobs obtained in the region during a given timeframe.

ceterms:jurisdiction.definition: The geo-political region in which the described resource is applicable.

ceterms:jurisdictionException.definition: A region for which the information in this profile does not apply.

ceterms:keyword.definition: Keywords or key phrases describing aspects of a resource considered useful for its discovery.

ceterms:latestVersion.definition: The latest version of the credential being described.

ceterms:learningMethodType.definition: The methods used to conduct the learning opportunity being referenced.

ceterms:learningOpportunityOffered.definition: A learning opportunity offered by the agent.

ceterms:learningOpportunityProfiled.definition: The cost profile being described is a profile of the learning opportunity being referenced.

ceterms:learningResource.definition: A resource that is used as part of an Educational Activity.

ceterms:mainJurisdiction.definition: The region to which the information in this profile is applicable.

ceterms:maintenanceProcess.definition: The process by which the resource being described is maintained including review and updating.

ceterms:majorAlignment.definition: There is major overlap of relevant concepts between the two resources being compared.

ceterms:maximumDuration.definition: The maximum amount of time it will take to complete the described resource.

ceterms:minimumAge.definition: The minimum allowed age (in years) at which a person is eligible for the credential.

ceterms:minimumDuration.definition: The minimum amount of time it will take to complete the described activity.

ceterms:minorAlignment.definition: There is minor overlap of relevant concepts between the two resources being compared.

ceterms:missionAndGoalsStatement.definition: A resource that defines or explains the mission and goals statement of the resource being described.

ceterms:missionAndGoalsStatementDescript.definition: The mission and goals statement of the described agent.

ceterms:naics.definition: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.

ceterms:name.definition: The name of the resource being described.

ceterms:narrowAlignment.definition: The resource being described covers all of the relevant concepts in the referenced resource as well as relevant concepts not found in the referenced resource.

ceterms:object.definition: The object upon [which] the action is carried out, whose state is kept intact or changed.

ceterms:offeredBy.definition: Access to the described resource is offered by the referenced agent.

ceterms:offeredIn.definition: The resource being described is offered in the jurisdiction being referenced.

ceterms:offers.definition: Offers access to or issues the resource being referenced.

ceterms:opeID.definition: OPE ID number (Office of Postsecondary Education Identification) sometimes referred to as the Federal School Code.

ceterms:ownedBy.definition: An agent that has an enforceable claim or title to a resource.

ceterms:owns.definition: The described agent has legal title to the referenced resource.

ceterms:parentOrganization.definition: The larger, parent organization of the organization being described.

ceterms:participant.definition: Other co-agents that participated in the action indirectly.

ceterms:partOfIdentifierValueSet.definition: The set of logically related identifiers to which the identifier being described belongs.

ceterms:paymentPattern.definition: The pattern with which payments are due.

ceterms:postOfficeBoxNumber.definition: The post office box number for PO box addresses.

ceterms:postReceiptMonths.definition: The number of months following the receipt of the credential when the employment and earnings data was collected.

ceterms:preparationFrom.definition: Preparation for the resource being described is provided by the resource being referenced.

ceterms:previousVersion.definition: The version of the credential that immediately precedes the credential being described.

ceterms:price.definition: The offer price of a product.

ceterms:processMethod.definition: A resource that describes the process methods.

ceterms:processMethodDescription.definition: A more detailed refinement of the process methods.

ceterms:processMethodType.definition: The methods used to confirm or validate the need for and relative importance of competencies and learning outcomes.

ceterms:processStandards.definition: A resource describing the criteria, standards, and/or requirements used.

ceterms:processStandardsDescription.definition: A description of the criteria, standards, and/or requirements used.

ceterms:purposeType.definition: The intended type of application of the credential by the holder.

ceterms:qualityAssuranceTargetType.definition: The class of resource that the agent accredits, endorses, approves, or recognizes.

ceterms:recognizedBy.definition: The agent being referenced acknowledges the validity of the described resource.

ceterms:recognizedIn.definition: The resource being described is publicly recommended, acknowledged, or endorsed in the jurisdiction being referenced.

ceterms:recognizes.definition: The agent being described recommends, endorses, indicates preference for, or otherwise provides positive judgment of a resource.

ceterms:recommends.definition: The resource being described recommends the resource being referenced.

ceterms:region.definition: A geo-political area of the described resource.

ceterms:regulatedBy.definition: The agent being referenced enforces the legal requirements of the referenced resource.

ceterms:regulatedIn.definition: The resource being described is regulated in the jurisdiction being referenced.

ceterms:regulates.definition: The agent being described monitors and enforces legal requirements or standards related to the resource being referenced.

ceterms:relatedAction.definition: An action related to the described resource.

ceterms:renewal.definition: Conditions necessary to maintenance and renewal of an awarded credential.

ceterms:renewedBy.definition: The agent being referenced handles the renewal of awards of the credential being described.

ceterms:renewedIn.definition: The resource being described is renewed in the jurisdiction being referenced.

ceterms:renews.definition: The described agent handles the renewal of an award of the referenced credential.

ceterms:requires.definition: The resource being described requires the resource being referenced.

ceterms:residencyType.definition: The type of a person's legal residency status.

ceterms:residentOf.definition: The geo-political region of which a person must be a legal resident or citizen in order to be eligible for the credential.

ceterms:resultingAward.definition: The result produced in the action.

ceterms:revocation.definition: Processes and criteria for ending (revoking) the validity or operation of an awarded credential.

ceterms:revocationCriteria.definition: A resource that provides information about the removal criteria for an awarded credential.

ceterms:revocationCriteriaDescription.definition: Information about the removal criteria for an awarded credential.

ceterms:revokedBy.definition: The referenced agent handles the revocation of an awarded credential from the credential holder due to violations.

ceterms:revokedIn.definition: The resource being described is revoked in the jurisdiction being referenced.

ceterms:revokes.definition: The described agent ends the validity or operation of the resource being referenced based on cause.

ceterms:sameAs.definition: The resource being described is the same as the resource being referenced.

ceterms:scoringMethodDescription.definition: The method used to score the assessment.

ceterms:scoringMethodExample.definition: A resource that is an example of the method or tool used to score the assessment.

ceterms:scoringMethodExampleDescription.definition: The text of an example of the method or tool used to score the assessment.

ceterms:scoringMethodType.definition: The type of method used to score the assessment.

ceterms:serviceType.definition: The type of service offered by the organization.

ceterms:socialMedia.definition: A social media resource for the resource being described.

ceterms:source.definition: The source of this resource's information.

ceterms:spatialCoverage.definition: The temporalCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the period that the content applies to, i.e. that it describes, either as a DateTime or as a textual string indicating a time period in ISO 8601 time interval format.

ceterms:streetAddress.definition: The street address. For example, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy.

ceterms:subject.definition: Words or brief phrases describing topicality of a resource.

ceterms:subjectWebpage.definition: The web page where the subject of the resource being described is located.

ceterms:subOrganization.definition: The organization being described is the parent of the organization being referenced.

ceterms:targetAssessment.definition: A resource that provides direct, indirect, formative or summative evaluation or estimation of the nature, ability, or quality for the resource being described.

ceterms:targetCompetency.definition: An alignment to a competency assertion in an established framework.

ceterms:targetCompetencyFramework.definition: The competency framework whose process is being described by this profile.

ceterms:targetContactPoint.definition: Options for contacting the resource being described.

ceterms:targetCredential.definition: A credential that is a focus or target of the resource being described.

ceterms:targetLearningOpportunity.definition: A learning opportunity that is the focus of the resource being described.

ceterms:targetLearningResource.definition: A resource that is used as part of an educational activity.

ceterms:targetNode.definition: The node of a framework targeted by the alignment.

ceterms:targetNodeDescription.definition: The description of a node in an established educational framework.

ceterms:targetNodeName.definition: The name of a node in an established educational framework.

ceterms:targetPathway.definition: A career pathway in which the credential being described is a potential component.

ceterms:taskDetails.definition: A resource that provides additional information about this task.

ceterms:taskProfiled.definition: The cost profile being described is a profile of the task being referenced.

ceterms:temporalCoverage.definition: The temporalCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the period that the content applies to, i.e. that it describes, either as a DateTime or as a textual string indicating a time period in ISO 8601 time interval format.

ceterms:trainingOffered.definition: A profile of a training opportunity offered by the agent.

ceterms:url.definition: URL of the resource being described.

ceterms:verificationDirectory.definition: Directories of credential holders and their current statuses.

ceterms:verificationMethodDescription.definition: Description of the methods used to evaluate the resource validity and reliability.

ceterms:verificationService.definition: A resource that provides a means of accessing the verification service.

ceterms:verifiedClaimType.definition: The type of claim type provided through a verification service.

ceterms:versionIdentifier.definition: An alphanumeric identifier of a version of the resource being described that is unique within the organizational context.

ceterms:weight.definition: An asserted measurement of the weight, degree, percent, or strength of a recommendation, requirement, or comparison.

ceterms:worksFor.definition: Organizations that the person works for.

ceterms:yearsOfExperience.definition: The number of years of relevant experience.

ceterms:AgentSector.definition: Enumeration of types of sociological, economic, or political subdivision of society.

ceterms:AgentServiceType.definition: The type of service offered by the organization.

ceterms:AssessmentUse.definition: An enumeration of intended uses of an assessment.

ceterms:Audience.definition: The types of audiences for which the resource being described is applicable or available.

ceterms:AudienceLevel.definition: Levels in an academic or training progression expected of or to be developed by the typical person for the resource being described.

ceterms:ClaimType.definition: Enumeration of the claim type(s) supported by a verification service.

ceterms:CostType.definition: Enumerations of the types of direct cost to attaining the credential.

ceterms:CredentialStatus.definition: Enumeration of the applicability statuses of a credential.

ceterms:CreditUnit.definition: Enumeration of the types of credit associated with degree and non-degree learning opportunities.

ceterms:Delivery.definition: The technical form of providing instances of the resource being described.

ceterms:ExternalInput.definition: Enumerations of types of external stakeholders that provide input to the validation process.

ceterms:IntendedPurpose.definition: The class of concept schemes identifying the credential holder's intended purpose in earning the credential.

ceterms:LearningMethod.definition: Enumeration of methods used to conduct the learning opportunity.

ceterms:Residency.definition: An enumeration of types of residency.

ceterms:ScoringMethod.definition: An enumeration of types of applicable scoring.
